entry.title: Photos Post 28: First Annual Report Moments of Growth

link.title: Photos Post 28: First Annual Report Moments of Growth

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The website Eternal Moments has now 3,312 images. Since CCT has started upoloading images to it on February 1, 2023, 1,202 images have been uploaded. We aim to continue uploading (as an average) 100 images per month.
In particular, below are the 12 new galleries which have been started in the last 12 months and which already have at least 24 images.
1. Books of Edward Saugstad: has 50 images.
2. Awards, Diplomas and Recognitions: has 57 images.
3. Gifts and Offerings: has 29 images.
4. India Tours by Colin Heinsen: has 133 images.
5. India Tours by Jo Băjescu: has 219 images.
6. Publications-Offerings: has 32 images.
7. Puja Seminars: has 75 images.
8. Personalities Paintings: has 24 images.
9. Personalities Photos: has 133 images.
10. ISPS: has 28 images.
11. Palazzo Doria by John Watkinson: has 26 images.
12. Śhuddy Camp by Colin Heinsen: has 204 images.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 97
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 6 Photos of the special event 2005-0828 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā, NJ, U.S.A. have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 6 low resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 35 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 2005.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, January 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, January 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 153 new Photos were uploaded to 12 Pūjas as follows (8 high resolutions, 112 medium resolutions, 18 low resolutions, and 15 low-medium resolutions).
(i) 1980-011x Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link UK 1978.
(ii) 1981-0126 Śhrī Lakṣhmī-Viṣhṇu Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link UK 1980.
(iii) 1986-0106 Śhrī Mahālakṣhmī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1981.
(iv) 1987-1025 Diwālī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1984.
(v) 1991-1110 Diwālī: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1985.
(vi) 2001-1225 Christmas Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1986.
(vii) 2003-1004 Pūjā (9th Day of Navarātri): 9 medium and 4 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1987.
(viii) 2003-1012 Navarātri Pūjā: 15 low-medium resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1988.
(ix) 2004-0919 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1988.
(x) 2005-0724 Guru Pūjā: 100 medium resolutions uploaded, link India 1988.
(xi) 2005-0904 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 11 low resolutions uploaded, link Switzerland 1989.
(xii) 2009-0912 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 3 low resolutions uploaded, link Switzerland 1989.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
